name: FMath
description:
In FMath game you are going to solve 250 mathematical problems, there are 5 blocks and 50 problems in each block. Every block is more complicated than previous one. You have certain amount of time to solve each problem, level of difficulty is increasing and the time to solve it is decreasing with every new problem. Try to solve all 250 problems and find out how well your mathematical thinking is developed.

FMath rules are quite simple:
You are given a problem and 6 possible answers to it. You have to choose the right one from the list. That’s all right if you make a mistake, as game provides you with “margin for error” (X5).
